definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
decoration/ornament/to decorate/to adorn/to hide/to conceal (a fault)/excuse (to hide a fault)/to play a role (in opera)/to impersonate

sentences.english: Pictures of foods, fruits, headwear of the foods and fruits. (
sentences.chinese: 食物和水果的图片及头饰。

sentences.english: And for example flat caps and some coronets, stem from Persia and Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 又如平顶帽和一些头饰，均来源于波斯和阿富汗。

sentences.english: His hair is tied in a topknot and He has earrings , bracelets and armlets.
sentences.chinese: 他的头发与头饰连成一体，还有耳环，手镯和臂环。
你该考虑一下冠状头饰。

sentences.english: Isabel: Her headdress is feathers of black and pink.
sentences.chinese: 她的头饰是黑色和粉色的羽毛“。

sentences.english: The headdress, high and square, is decorated with lozenges .
sentences.chinese: 该头饰，高度和面积，装饰有含片。

sentences.english: She twined the bridal arch with flowers.
sentences.chinese: 她将新娘拱形头饰用花缠起来。

sentences.english: The character on this man's headdress means "spirit".
sentences.chinese: 这位男士头饰上的字代表着“灵魂”的意思。

sentences.english: Tibetan costumes and head adornments have kept the styles handed down by Tibetans' hunting ancestors.
sentences.chinese: 藏族服饰和头饰艺术保留着祖先猎人时代的装饰遗风。

sentences.english: They also wore headdresses for special occasions.
sentences.chinese: 他们还戴上了特殊场合头饰。

sentences.english: Does your 4-year-old son dress up in his big sister's tiaras and princess costumes?
sentences.chinese: 你四岁的儿子会穿戴他姐姐的头饰和公主裙吗？

sentences.english: As such, the word has been translated as "mitre" or "headdress. "
sentences.chinese: 因此，这个词被翻译为“迈特”或“头饰。”

sentences.english: Crowns of thorns for Ellen\'s virgin bridehood. Veils of tears.
sentences.chinese: 荆棘的花冠是处女埃伦新娘的头饰，泪水是她的面纱。

sentences.english: Dedi prepares his head dress the night before the Pasola.
sentences.chinese: 帕索拉血祭前夜，斗士在准备着自己的头饰。

sentences.english: With the society moving forward, the headgears will keep changing as well.
sentences.chinese: 而且，随着时代的进步，头饰还会继续改变。

sentences.english: I also couldn't believe those Muslim girls with their eyeliner and fashionable matching headscarves.
sentences.chinese: 穆斯林女孩描着眼线，戴着时髦的头饰，难以置信。

definition: hair worn in a bun or coil
